name: Python 3
updateContentCommand: if command -v apt-get &> /dev/null; then sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y libgl1-mesa-glx libgl1; elif command -v yum &> /dev/null; then sudo yum update -y && sudo yum install -y mesa-libGL; elif command -v apk &> /dev/null; then sudo apk update && sudo apk add --no-cache libgl mesa-gl; fi
postCreateCommand: pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt && pip3 install --user streamlit && pip3 uninstall -y opencv-python && pip3 install --user --upgrade opencv-contrib-python
